channel.title: Upcoming OECD Publication Embargoes and Launches
channel.description: A list of dates and publications

item.title: Corporate effective tax rates for R&D - The case of expenditure-based R&D tax incentives
item.description: Corporate effective tax rates for R&D - The case of expenditure-based R&D tax incentives by Centre for Tax Policy and Administration has an embargo on Thursday 29 July 2021 at 11:00.
